spells.description: Use: Zoom in on the targeted location.
Equip: While above 80% health, direct healing you do also redistributes up to 2% of your health to your target.

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.1 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 554,255.
Set: Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify apply Insurance! for 10 sec to one target while Apotheosis is active. Your healing is increased by 1% for each Insurance! active on allies.

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

spells.description:
Use: Command the Medichopper to attach to your target, absorbing 258,719 damage and granting them 1,442 versatility for 15 sec.

While attached, your healing spells have a chance to refuel the chopper, granting these bonuses to their host again. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Intellect by 2,421, up to 12,109.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 1.7 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.
Equip: Your spells have a chance to call down a Voltaic Stormrook, inflicting 223,011 Nature damage split between nearby enemies and granting 2,470 Haste, further increased for each enemy struck.
